title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Thoroughly investigate and document the project requirements. This involves specifying knowledge sources to be integrated (APIs, databases), desired features and functionalities, target users and use cases, as well as any constraints or limitations that should be considered during development. Additionally, identify potential data privacy and security concerns that may arise from integrating various knowledge sources, propose strategies for addressing them, and research best practices for AI-powered tools in the field of knowledge graph enrichment. The task also includes an assessment of required resources (e.g., hardware, software) and timelines. Upon completion, compile findings into a comprehensive requirements document that includes a section on AI ethics to guide further development. Also, consider conducting a SWOT analysis for project planning purposes. The task may require collaboration with team members from various disciplines such as AI, database management, security, and user experience design. Once complete, share the requirements document with the team for review and refinement. Upon final approval, update the document to serve as the project's blueprint and reference guide for development. 

Upon completion, update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEW'.

**Suggested Changes:**
- Clarify that the AI-powered tool will not only enrich knowledge graphs but also automatically do so.
- Add a bullet point about the need for real-time or near real-time data processing capabilities due to the dynamic nature of knowledge graphs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Design Data Model
description: Design the data model for storing and representing the knowledge graph and its associated metadata.

title: Develop Web Crawling and Data Extraction Components
description: Develop components for crawling the web and extracting relevant information from various sources.

title: Develop Knowledge Graph Enrichment and Reasoning Components
description: Develop components for enriching the knowledge graph with new information and performing reasoning tasks.

title: Develop User Interface and Contribution Mechanisms
description: Develop the user interface and mechanisms for users to contribute and validate knowledge graph information.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to protect the system and user data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the application, covering installation, usage, and maintenance.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
